title: PTI clinches 13 crucial PA seats
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP): Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) has so far clinched 13 crucial seats of the Punjab Assembly in by-elections held on Sunday.
According to the unofficial result of 16 seats announced by the Election Commission of Pakistan, the ruling PML-N secured two seats while one independent defeated the candidates of PTI and PML-N to grab a key seat.
PTI got a major victory on three out of four provincial seats in Lahore in the Punjab by-polls as per unofficial and unconfirmed results.
